utilize.name: Write text with impressive flourishes that guard against forgery
: Seal or pry open a door or container
Draft a map of a small area
Modify footwear to give Advantage on the wearer's next Dexterity (Acrobatics) check
Mimic 10 or fewer words of someone else's handwriting
Add a design to a leather item
: Chisel a symbol or hole in stone
Paint a recognizable image of something you've seen
Discern what a ceramic object held in the past 24 hours
Pry open a door or container
Assemble a Tiny item composed of scrap, which falls apart in 1 minute
